item.title: Windows Exploit Development: Vanilla Buffer Overflow
item.description: Prologue Exploit Development is an art that only a select few venture to explore. So many of us run the script and watch it fail only to sit back and think well that didn’t work. Oh well. It takes enormous amounts of time, knowledge, and Googling while testing, failing, and failing a thousand more times until finally something happens. It’s these individuals that frighten the world; that have the motivation to press onward into nearly always unfamiliar territory to find vulnerabilities in applications for the good or bad.
